name: bbc-grandstand
description: The BBC Grandstand CSS Framework is used by Sport and Live components

scripts.dist: bower install && node-sass src/bbc-grandstand.scss dist/bbc-grandstand.min.css --output-style=compressed --sourcemap=none && node-sass src/bbc-grandstand.scss dist/bbc-grandstand.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none

author: Shaun Bent <shaun.bent@bbc.co.uk>
